original_text: And he said unto his brethren, My money is restored; and, lo, it is even in my sack: and their heart failed them, and they were afraid, saying one to another, What is this that God hath done unto us?
korean_text: 그가 그 형제에게 말하되 내 돈을 도로 넣었도다 보라 자루 속에 있도다 이에 그들이 혼이 나서 떨며 서로 돌아보며 말하되 하나님이 어찌하여 이런 일을 우리에게 행하셨는가 하고

sentences.original_text: And he said unto his brethren
and, lo, it is even in my sack
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 내 자루에 그 돈이 있다

sentences.original_text: What is this that God hath done unto us?
